title: Pride
description: Everyone's got something to brag Kaia's getting it on with bachelor #1, though scruffball Reed's gotten to be quite an interesting distraction.Kane and Harper got exactly what they Namely, Beth and Adam. (Though to keep gettin' it, their secrets -- and pasts -- best stay forgotten.)Miranda got her heart broken, but now she's all decked with a new look and strategy.Sometimes, though, you only think you've got everything....
author: Robin Wasserman
